dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset generated from a high-resolution statistical shape model (SSM) based on the biventricular shape model created from 3D cardiac MRI scans of 1084 healthy volunteers. It includes 3D biventricular surface meshes and corresponding sparse 2D cine MRI inputs.
dcterms:title: 3D MRI-based statistical shape model

dcterms:creator: S. E. Petersen

dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 2D cine MRI acquisitions of 1000 subjects randomly selected from the UK Biobank study, including various cardiac phases and slices for comprehensive analysis.
dcterms:title: UK Biobank
